string-array.name: textViewAppInfo_List
string-array.item: "Esikrinini sezilungiselelo zendawo, vula okuthi Sebenzisa indawo. "

"Esikrinini sohlelo lokusebenza lendawo yenkampani yenethiwekhi, thepha okuthi Vumela isikhathi. (Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ludinga le leveli yokufinyelela ukuze isebenze.)
"

string-array.name: textViewAppInfo_Paragraphs_After_List
string-array.item: "Inothi: Inkampani yakho yenethiwekhi ingafinyelela indawo yedivayisi yakho uma udayela noma uthumela umbhalo inombolo yesimo esiphuthumayo nangesikhathi esikhawulelwe ngemuva kwalokho, ngisho noma uvala izilungiselelo zendawo nokunqabela imvume yendawo yalolu hlelo lokusebenza. "

string-array.name: textViewAppInfo_Paragraphs_Before_List
string-array.item: "Lolu hlelo lokusebenza likuvumela ukuthi unike ukufinyelela kuzinkampani zenethiwekhi endaweni yedivayisi yakho. Inkampani yenethiwekhi ingasebenzisa lolu lwazi nganoma iyiphi inhloso. Ukuze unike ukufinyelela kwinkampani yenethiwekhi: "
